caption_text:
Hands up if you’ve ever been judged or judged yourself for feeling rage 🙋🏻‍♀️

Rage becomes sacred when it’s metabolized into boundary, voice, and action. 

But when it’s suppressed or projected, it can turn destructive.

Because when rage isn’t met, it doesn’t just go away. 

It turns inward and can show up as anxiety, numbness, shutdown, chronic tension, or shame for being “too much,” especially for those of us whose anger was never meant to be welcomed in the first place.

That’s why we’re gathering. Not to perform rage or discharge it, but to finally learn what it’s here to teach us and how to work with it.

Join myself and @maraleegilbert  and @thyme.space this Wednesday evening for a 90-minute live workshop exploring the power of rage as a teacher — through somatic practice, energy teachings, and herbal wisdom to work with, not against your rage.

🗓 Wednesday Dec 17
⏰ 7pm EST · 90 minutes

→ Somatic practices
→ Energetic teaching (the realms of rage)
→ Herbal wisdom to support your process 

🎥 Replay included
🎁 Bonus gift + early access to our Temple of the Burning Heart sacred rage retreat for those attending live

Y’all know where to sign up 🤍

#sacredrage
